Based on my search results, I can provide you with comprehensive information about Little Prince merchandise, fashion collaborations, and commercial products:

## Official Fashion Collaborations

The Little Prince teams up with Vates for a limited-edition collection that celebrates Antoine de Saint-Exupéry's masterpiece. This collaboration brings the iconic characters of the story to life through unique clothing and accessories, blending poetry with modern design. The Fox, the Rose, the Snake, and of course, the Little Prince himself, are featured on t-shirts, sweaters, tote bags, and phone cases, illustrated with patterns inspired by the story.

A new collaboration is born between The Little Prince and Jule & Lily, a Parisian design duo with a tender and distinctive style.

## Official Merchandise Channels

The Little Prince transmits its values through a foundation, products, an official boutique and a family theme park. To celebrate the 80th anniversary of the first edition of Saint Exupéry's famous tale, the Little Prince website is getting a makeover! News, new products, educational content, online store, you'll discover the whole world of Antoine de Saint Exupéry's masterpiece.

## Licensed Commercial Products

The merchandise categories include:

- Accessories: From backpacks and keychains to stationery and mugs

## Commercial Impact

The commercial impact of The Little Prince merchandise is significant, with:
- Multiple official licensing partnerships for fashion and products
- A dedicated official online store and boutique
- Widespread availability through major retailers (Amazon, specialty stores)
- Thriving independent artist marketplace on platforms like Etsy and Redbubble
- Officially Licensed Merchandise: Rest assured, our products are authentic and officially licensed, ensuring quality and legitimacy

The brand maintains strict licensing standards while also inspiring a vibrant community of independent creators, demonstrating both commercial success and cultural impact across official and fan-made merchandise channels.
